title: Drawing, "Portrait of a Young Man", ca. 1795
signed: Lower right in pen and ink: Wicar
inscribed: Lower right in pen and ink: Wicar
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Bust portrait of a young man, in three-quater view facing left.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Portrait of a Young Man", ca. 1795.
ca. 1795. Graphite on blue-gray wove paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-7045.
